text: "They Don't Know" is a song by UK garage/hip hop group So Solid Crew. It is the title track of their 2001 debut album, and was released as the third single off the album. The song was a Top 5 hit, peaking at #3 on the UK Singles Chart. It was the second of five consecutive Top 20 hit singles for the group. ==Track listing== ;UK 12" single :A. "They Don't Know" (Full Length Original Version) – 5:10 :B. "Envy" (They Don't Know - Vocal Remix) (featuring Da Twins & Ms. Dynamite) – 5:47 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2001) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2001 singles Category:So Solid Crew songs Category:UK Dance Singles Chart number-one singles Category:2001 songs Category:Relentless Records singles
